title: Antique lamp

properties.name: description
properties.value: Antique lamps are rewards from quests, achievement diaries and the Varrock Museum miniquest. Like regular lamps, these lamps grant a player experience in a chosen skill, and the skill chosen must usually be over a certain level which is unboostable.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Antique lamp

Antique lamps are rewards from quests, achievement diaries and the Varrock Museum miniquest. Like regular lamps, these lamps grant a player experience in a chosen skill, and the skill chosen must usually be over a certain level which is unboostable.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Varrock Museum miniquest:
    • Infinite can be obtained as a possible reward from cleaning: 500 XP in a skill of at least 10.
    • Three from giving information about quests Making History, Merlin's Crystal and Shield of Arrav[1]: 1,000 XP in a skill of at least level 20.
      • Additionally, giving information about the Curse of the Empty Lord awards one antique lamp granting 10,000 XP in a skill of at least 50.
  • Fairy Tale II - Cure a Queen awards one antique lamp granting 2,500 XP in a skill of at least 30.
  • Recipe for Disaster awards one antique lamp granting 20,000 XP in a skill of at least 50.
  • One Small Favour awards two antique lamps granting 10,000 XP each in a skill of at least 30.
  • A Tail of Two Cats awards two antique lamps granting 2,500 XP each in a skill of at least 30.
  • King's Ransom awards an antique lamp granting 5,000 XP to any skill level 50 or above.
  • Architectural Alliance awards an antique lamp granting 10,000 XP to any skill level 40 or above.
  • Client of Kourend awards two antique lamps granting 500 XP in any skill.
  • X Marks the Spot awards an antique lamp granting 300 XP in any skill.

Achievement diaries[edit | edit source]

  • Karamja Diary: 4 antique lamps, giving 1,000, 5,000, 10,000 and 50,000 XP for completing the easy, medium, hard and elite diaries respectively. A player does not need any skill level requirement in order to claim the easy antique lamp experience, but requires to have a minimum level of 30, 40 and 70 in the desired skill for the remaining three respectively.
  • All other Achievement diaries: 4 antique lamps, giving 2,500, 7,500, 15,000 and 50,000 XP for completing the easy, medium, hard, and elite diaries respectively. In order to be able to claim the experience, a player must have a level of at least 30, 40, 50 and 70 respectively in the desired skill.
  • â€­Every Achievement Diary lamp combined would give a total of 891,000 XP.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 2 November 2018. (Archived from the original on 25 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "Making History, Merlin's Crystal and Shield of Arrav. Also the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest."

rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
[[File:Antique lamp detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Antique lamps''' are rewards from [[quests]], [[achievement diaries]] and the [[Varrock Museum]] [[miniquest]]. Like regular [[lamp]]s, these lamps grant a player [[experience]] in a chosen [[skill]], and the skill chosen must usually be over a certain level which is unboostable.

==Quests==

*[[Varrock Museum]] [[miniquest]]:
**Infinite can be obtained as a possible reward from [[Uncleaned find|cleaning]]: 500 XP in a skill of at least 10.
**Three from giving information about quests [[Making History]], [[Merlin's Crystal]] and [[Shield of Arrav]]{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1058333324891095040|date=2 November 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/2N2f6|archivedate=25 May 2020|quote=Making History, Merlin's Crystal and Shield of Arrav. Also the Curse of the Empty Lord miniquest.}}: 1,000 XP in a skill of at least level 20.
***Additionally, giving information about the [[Curse of the Empty Lord]] awards one antique lamp granting 10,000 XP in a skill of at least 50.
*[[Fairy Tale II - Cure a Queen]] awards one antique lamp granting 2,500 XP in a skill of at least 30.
*[[Recipe for Disaster]] awards one antique lamp granting 20,000 XP in a skill of at least 50.
*[[One Small Favour]] awards two antique lamps granting 10,000 XP each in a skill of at least 30.
*[[A Tail of Two Cats]] awards two antique lamps granting 2,500 XP each in a skill of at least 30.
*[[King's Ransom]] awards an antique lamp granting 5,000 XP to any skill level 50 or above.
*[[Architectural Alliance]] awards an antique lamp granting 10,000 XP to any skill level 40 or above.
*[[Client of Kourend]] awards two antique lamps granting 500 XP in any skill.
*[[X Marks the Spot]] awards an antique lamp granting 300 XP in any skill.

==Achievement diaries==

*[[Karamja Diary]]: 4 antique lamps, giving 1,000, 5,000, 10,000 and 50,000 XP for completing the easy, medium, hard and elite diaries respectively. A player does not need any skill level requirement in order to claim the easy antique lamp experience, but requires to have a minimum level of 30, 40 and 70 in the desired skill for the remaining three respectively.
*All other [[Achievement diaries]]: 4 antique lamps, giving 2,500, 7,500, 15,000 and 50,000 XP for completing the easy, medium, hard, and elite diaries respectively. In order to be able to claim the experience, a player must have a level of at least 30, 40, 50 and 70 respectively in the desired skill.
*â€­Every Achievement Diary lamp combined would give a total of 891,000 XP.
